title: RoLA: A Real-Time Online Lightweight Anomaly Detection System for Multivariate Time Series. (arXiv:2305.16509v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: A multivariate time series refers to observations of two or more variables taken from a device or a system simultaneously over time. There is an increasing need to monitor multivariate time series and detect anomalies in real time to ensure proper system operation and good service quality. It is also highly desirable to have a lightweight anomaly detection system that considers correlations between different variables, adapts to changes in the pattern of the multivariate time series, offers immediate responses, and provides supportive information regarding detection results based on unsupervised learning and online model training. translated_title: RoLA：一种轻量级、实时的多元时间序列异常检测系统
translated_abstract: 多元时间序列指同时从设备或系统中获取两个或更多变量的观测结果。现在越来越需要实时监测多元时间序列并检测异常以确保系统正常运行和良好的服务质量。同时，拥有一种考虑不同变量之间相关性、适应多元时间序列模式变化、提供即时响应并基于无监督学习和在线模型训练提供支持性信息的轻量级异常检测系统也非常有价值。但过去十年中，许多多元时间序列异常检测方法无法提供所有上述特点。因此，在本文中，我们提出了RoLA，一种基于分治策略、并行处理和主义的多元时间序列实时在线异常检测系统。
tldr: RoLA是一种实时在线的轻量级多元时间序列异常检测系统，采用分治策略、并行处理和主义方法，能够考虑不同变量之间的相关性和适应多元时间序列模式变化。
en_tdlr: RoLA is a real-time online lightweight anomaly detection system for multivariate time series based on a divide-and-conquer strategy, parallel processing, and the majority. It can consider correlations between different variables and adapt to changes in the pattern of the multivariate time series.
